mapper.select: SELECT sr.id id, sr.create_time createTime, sr.`name` `name`, sr.url url, sr.description description, sr.category_id categoryId FROM t_sys_admin_role_relation ar LEFT JOIN t_sys_role r ON ar.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN t_sys_role_resource_relation rrr ON r.id = rrr.role_id LEFT JOIN t_sys_resource sr ON sr.id = rrr.resource_id WHERE ar.admin_id = #{adminId} AND sr.id IS NOT NULL AND sr.deleted = 0 AND ar.deleted = 0 AND r.deleted = 0 AND rrr.deleted = 0 GROUP BY sr.id

SELECT r.* FROM t_sys_role r LEFT JOIN t_sys_admin_role_relation arr ON r.id = arr.role_id LEFT JOIN t_sys_admin a ON arr.admin_id = a.id WHERE a.id = #{adminId} AND arr.deleted = 0 AND r.deleted = 0 AND a.deleted = 0
